metadata.title: CVE-2023-37445 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities exist in the VCD var definitionsection functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vcd file canlead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a maliciousfile to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns theout-of-bounds write when triggered via the vcd2vzt conversion utility.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
